pull.title: Add `Copy address` Peers Tab Context Menu Action
pull.body:
Picking up #264 

This adds a `Copy Address` context menu action to the `Peers Tab`.

Based on the first commit of PR #317 so that we can use `Qt::DisplayRole` in the `copyEntryData` function.

| Master        | PR               |
| ----------- | ----------- |
|  ![Screen Shot 2021-05-05 at 4 51 11 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/117117822-fb067400-ad5d-11eb-9466-228456108e52.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-05-05 at 4 49 15 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/117117835-fe99fb00-ad5d-11eb-8de0-f6a9acdbf40e.png) |

labels.name: UX
labels.description: All about "how to get things done"

events.body: Concept ACK. But I'm not fond of the base commit "gui: add Direction column to peers tab" - I understand it simplifies this change.

updated from 6ee6d2f -> d6099b7 ([pr318.01](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.01), [pr318.02](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.02), [diff](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/compare/pr318.01...jarolrod:pr318.02))

- rebase on top of updated last commit of #317 
- add translator comment for `Copy address` action

updated from d6099b7 -> 85e0f95 ([pr318.02](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.02) -> [pr318.03](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.03))

**Changes:**
- Rebased over master because of conflict with #313 (because this is based on #317)

updated from 85e0f95 -> 65d1d35 ([pr318.03](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.03) -> [pr318.04](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.04), [diff](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/compare/pr318.03...jarolrod:pr318.04))

- rebased to solve conflict with #311 (because this is based on #317)
@jarolrod needs rebase, this is a cool change.

events.message:
qt: Add "Copy address" item to the context menu in the Peers table

Co-authored-by: Jarol Rodriguez <jarolrod@tutanota.com>

events.body:
updated from 65d1d35 -> 3ec061d ([pr318.04](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.04) -> [pr318.05](https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/pr318.05))

Changes:
- rebased over recent changes
- Dropped commit from #317 as it was merged
- addressed @luke-jr comments and added a mnemonic shortcut

tACK 3ec061d9da0c8742bd9dec94ffeb82a11d000aba Tested on Ubuntu 20.04 (Using Qt version 5.12.8) This PR adds the functionality to copy the address of a peer from the peertable itself. Tested this PR on Ubuntu 20.04. And I was able to observe the change working correctly. |Master|PR| |----------|----| |![Master](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85434418/132876382-bcb1eaa2-5e4d-4d54-afeb-b6c7d5fcc6c8.png)|![Screenshot from 2021-09-10 20-09-40](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85434418/132876457-65ae3afa-2083-457d-a6ff-122fb8091354.png)| I agree with the changes suggested in this PR. After #384 being merged, I think it is the next logical step to also having the functionality of copying the address of peer from peertable using the context menu action.

ACK 3ec061d9da0c8742bd9dec94ffeb82a11d000aba, tested on Linux Mint 20.2 (Qt 5.12.8):

![Screenshot from 2021-09-12 18-49-30](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/132994212-e0450618-3e23-4a60-9b45-9b506bcdb588.png)
